text: Cristhian Pacheco (born 26 May 1993) is a Peruvian long distance runner who specialises in the marathon. He competed in the men's marathon event at the 2016 Summer Olympics. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Peruvian male long-distance runners Category:Peruvian male marathon runners Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic athletes of Peru Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2019 Pan American Games Category:Pan American Games competitors for Peru Category:Pan American Games gold medalists for Peru Category:Pan American Games medalists in athletics (track and field) Category:Pan American Games gold medalists in athletics (track and field)
title: Cristhian Pacheco
